rooms.description: An inviting entrance hall with ample natural light from a transom window.
A spacious living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and large sliding glass doors leading to the balcony, promoting natural ventilation and ample light.
Modern kitchen with integrated appliances and workspaces optimized for functionality and adherence to Vastu principles of energy flow.
Well-ventilated bathroom designed following local building norms and Vastu guidelines to ensure balance.
Bachelors' bedroom with a spacious balcony offering scenic views and natural light; designed for privacy and relaxation.
Second bedroom featuring an expansive balcony to enhance ventilation and provide a serene outlook, perfect for a bachelor pad.
Third bedroom with dedicated balcony space ensuring natural light and ventilation, adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Multipurpose area that can serve as a study or recreational room, designed with large openings for optimal natural lighting and ventilation.

openings.description: Main entrance door connecting the entrance hall to the living room area.
Large floor-to-ceiling window providing abundant natural light and ventilation.
Sliding door to the private balcony ensuring ease of access and enhanced natural ventilation.
Sliding door to the expansive balcony that provides a serene outlook.
Balcony door offering direct access to personal outdoor space for relaxation.
Large window ensuring ample natural light and promoting airflow in the multipurpose area.

amenities.description: An inviting swimming pool at the south end of the plot, designed to maximize exposure to natural light and adhere to Vastu principles.
